body: LEAD: Christmas comes to New York City in many ways, in the paiper-mache wings of a young Greek Orthodox girl preparing for her first Nativity pageant, in the spicy holiday pasteles of a Puerto Rican family, in the bright Lucia crowns of a Swedish boy, in the carols sung heartily in a Korean church. title: In New York City, a Rainbow Christmas

body: LEAD: THE castlelike stationhouse of the old 18th Police Precinct has long been a landmark on Fourth Avenue in the Sunset Park section of Brooklyn. title: STREETSCAPES: THE 18TH PRECINCT STATION HOUSE; A Sunset Park 'Fortress' Rescued From Destruction
